PicklistValueInfo.name: PicklistValueInfo
PicklistValueInfo.description: Represents the active picklist values for a given picklist field.

EntityParticleId.description: Represents the picklist field to which this value is related.

IsActive.description: Indicates whether the picklist value is active or not.

IsDefaultValue.description: Indicates whether this value is the default for the picklist field. Only one value can be the default value.

Label.description: The label for the picklist value.

ValidFor.description: A set of bits where each bit indicates a controlling value for which this picklist value is valid.

Value.description: The API name of the picklist value.
